about_the_game:
Wallpaper Master is a wallpaper software. Unlike other wallpaper software, Wallpaper Master adopts a brand new technology, a new wallpaper will be randomly synthesized after each refresh. Wallpaper Master system resource overhead is extremely low, most of the time CPU utilization is 0%，Prolonged use will not affect computer performance。

Features

  • Random Stop Motion Animation Wallpaper
A new wallpaper is randomly synthesized after each refresh to keep the desktop fresh. Very low system resource overhead

  • Support Live Wallpaper
Support for live wallpapers in multiple formats such as web pages and videos

  • Convert live wallpaper to stop motion animation
Convert live wallpapers into stop-motion animated wallpapers with more resource saving

  • AI Wallpaper
Set artificial intelligence as wallpaper, you can observe the process of artificial intelligence playing games on the desktop, and it will get better and better results with the passage of training time. Come and train your unique AI.

name: Wallpaper Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP,7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz Intel i5 or equivalen
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: New Features:Stop motion wallpaper, also supports webpage, video live wallpaper, micro-motion wallpaper, artificial intelligence wallpaper.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
